prompts.name: Marketing Strategy Proposal
prompts.description: This template guides the creation of a detailed marketing strategy proposal. Replace {{target market}} with a description of the audience the marketing campaign is targeted towards, {{proposed marketing channels}} with the channels to be used in the campaign, and {{expected results}} with the forecasted outcome of the campaign.
prompts.content: Develop a comprehensive marketing strategy proposal aimed at {{target market}}. Discuss how to utilise {{proposed marketing channels}} effectively and provide insight on {{expected results}}, correlated with specific strategies. Remember to omit speculative data or unapproved marketing tactics.

prompts.name: Product Launch Plan
prompts.description: Use this template to formulate a product launch plan. Substitute {{product name}} with the name of the product to be launched, {{launch strategy}} with the strategy for the launch, and {{key marketing activities}} with detailed actions to promote the product.
prompts.content: Draft a robust product launch plan for {{product name}}. The plan must detail the {{launch strategy}} and set out {{key marketing activities}}, ensuring synchronisation with overall marketing goals. Refrain from discussing unconfirmed launch dates or speculative market reactions.

prompts.name: Brand Positioning Statement
prompts.description: This template aids in creating a powerful brand positioning statement. Replace {{brand name}} with the name of the brand, {{brand's unique attributes}} with characteristics that differentiate the brand from competition, and {{brand promise}} with an expression of the value the brand promises to deliver.
prompts.content: Craft a compelling brand positioning statement for {{brand name}}. It should articulate {{brand's unique attributes}}, define target consumers, and end with the {{brand promise}}. Do not include information that is unsubstantiated or not in line with the brand's established image and values.

prompts.name: Social Media Campaign Brief
prompts.description: Use this template to arrange a comprehensive social media campaign brief. Insert {{campaign objectives}} for the goals the campaign should achieve, {{target platforms}} for the social media platforms to be used, and {{content strategy}} with a plan for the content to be posted.
prompts.content: Develop a brief for a social media campaign outlining its {{campaign objectives}}, envisaging which {{target platforms}} will be utilised and proposing a {{content strategy}} tailored towards the target audience. The brief must not deviate from the company's social media policies or unduly expose the brand to reputational risk.

prompts.name: Marketing Budget Allocation
prompts.description: This template assists in outlining the marketing budget allocation. Replace {{marketing sectors}} with the various marketing areas, the {{allocated budget}} with each sectorâ€™s budget allocations, and {{justification}} with the reasons behind those allocations.
prompts.content: Prepare a comprehensive write-up that communicates the budget allocation. Explain changes made in the allocation for different {{marketing sectors}}, detailing the {{allocated budget}} for each and providing a robust {{justification}} for it. Exclude any confidential financial statements or internal financial strategies.

prompts.name: Content Marketing Plan
prompts.description: This template helps create a comprehensive content marketing plan. Substitute {{content categories}} with types of content to be created, {{publication platforms}} with where to post the content, and {{content goals}} with the results intended to achieve with the content.
prompts.content: Construct a content marketing plan that outlines the {{content categories}} to be produced, outlines the targeted {{publication platforms}}, and states the {{content goals}}. Do remember to make the objectives clear, measurable, and attached to a specific timeline.

prompts.name: Market Research Analysis
prompts.description: This template guides the development of market research analysis. Replace {{research topic}} with the subject matter of the research, {{key findings}} with the significant discoveries from the research, and {{strategic implications}} with potential impacts these findings may have on the marketing strategy.
prompts.content: Assemble a comprehensive market research analysis covering {{research topic}}. Detail {{key findings}} and discuss their {{strategic implications}} in relation to our existing and future marketing plans. Be sure to maintain the confidentiality of data sources that are not publicly accessible.

prompts.name: Competitor Benchmarking Report
prompts.description: Use this template to compile a competitor benchmarking report. Substitute {{key competitors}} with your main business rivals, {{benchmarking parameters}} with the aspects you're examining, and {{competitive analysis}} with your analysis of how you compare to these competitors.
prompts.content: Draft a competitor benchmarking report that analyses {{key competitors}} across various {{benchmarking parameters}} like product portfolio, market share, pricing, and marketing strategies. Offer a thorough {{competitive analysis}} detailing where we excel and areas for improvement. Be cautious about revealing any proprietary strategic information.

prompts.name: Digital Marketing Audit
prompts.description: This template is for creating a digital marketing audit. Replace {{audit areas}} with the digital marketing segments to be audited, {{current performance}} with an evaluation of the existing performance, and {{recommendations}} with your suggestions for improvement based on the audit results.
prompts.content: Conduct a digital marketing audit encompassing various {{audit areas}} such as SEO, email marketing, social media, and web analytics. The report should detail {{current performance}} of our digital assets and include a set of actionable {{recommendations}} to enhance future performance. Be mindful not to include sensitive or classified company data.

prompts.name: Event Marketing Proposal
prompts.description: This template aids in putting together an event marketing proposal. Substitute {{event details}} with the specifics of the event, {{marketing activities}} with the promotional actions planned around the event, and {{expected outcomes}} with the event's projected impact.
prompts.content: Prepare a robust event marketing proposal providing the {{event details}}, defining the {{marketing activities}} to promote the event, and articulating {{expected outcomes}} in terms of audience reach, brand exposure, and potential lead generation. Avoid disclosing budgetary details or other sensitive information until final approval.
